name: Fractured Harry Potter Book 5 Online Trivia | Fractured Books | 10 Questions

questions.text: Awkward sigh ink whiz at her?
questions.explanation:
Hogwarts High Inquisitor.

	By order of the Ministry of Magic, the toadlike Professor Umbridge ascends to the Nazi-esque rank of Hogwarts High Inquisitor. In my opinion, Umbridge is the most deliciously loathsome villainess in the entire HP series.

Luna Lovegood.

	A friend of Ginny's from Ravenclaw, Luna seems to have bats in her belfry--but she turns out to be brave and kind when she's tested. Her dad runs the wizarding world's version of a tabloid newspaper.

Nymphadora Tonks.

	Young Tonks (who prefers to be known by her surname only), dresses like a punk rocker and periodically changes her haircolor to hues such as lime green, shocking pink, and neon orange. She aids Moody, Lupin, and the other Order of the Phoenix members in guarding Harry.

Olympe Maxime.

	A half giant like Hagrid, Madame Maxime is the headmistress of Beauxbatons wizarding school. She and Hagrid go on a mission to persuade the remaining giants to help fight Voldemort.

Dolores Jane Umbridge.

	Before she comes to Hogwarts as Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher, the squat, sadistic, honey-voiced Umbridge is Senior Undersecretary to the Minister of Magic, Cornelius Fudge.

Sirius Black.

	Tragically, Harry's beloved godfather, his dad's best friend, dies in this book. He's killed in a duel with the evil Bellatrix Lestrange. The Black family's house elf, Kreacher, betrays Sirius.

Dumbledore's Army.

	At first the students want to call their Defense Against the Dark Arts class "the Defense Association," but Ginny Weasley suggests "Dumbledore's Army," instead. Harry teaches the group.

The Order of the Phoenix.

	This is the group of wizards and witches who work secretly against Voldemort and his Death Eaters.

Grimmauld Place.

	Number Twelve Grimmauld Place is where the Order have their headquarters. It's also Sirius Black's ancestral home.

Bellatrix Lestrange.

	One of Voldemort's Death Eaters, Bellatrix kills poor Sirius. She and her husband were the ones who tortured Neville Longbottom's parents until they lost their sanity.
